instructions: Add the sage, thyme, garlic powder, salt, pepper and cayenne.
Add the ground pork and squish it all together with your hands.
Pan fry for 3 - 4 minutes per side.
title: Breakfast Sausage
steps: Beat the egg well. Add the sage, thyme, garlic powder, salt, pepper and cayenne. Beat again. Add the ground pork and squish it all together with your hands.
Form into 6 patties. Pan fry for 3 - 4 minutes per side.
